abstract: After losing years ago on “The Apprentice,” Josh Shaw still gets second looks when traveling. But maybe it’s all the skin care samples he has people try.
snippet: After losing years ago on “The Apprentice,” Josh Shaw still gets second looks when traveling. But maybe it’s all the skin care samples he has people try.
lead_paragraph: WHEN I’m at the airport, people think they know me. They ask if we went to school together, if I am a former neighbor or if I coach their child’s soccer team.

headline.main: Marketing Midair With a Familiar Face
headline.print_headline: Marketing Midair With a Familiar Face
